N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.9 - Use of front crossing arms

State Regulations

Any school bus painted national school bus chrome may be
equipped with a front crossing arm. Such front crossing arm shall only be
activated while the school bus is stopped and engaged in receiving or
discharging pupils. Further, such front crossing arm shall be used only in
accordance with the directions of the Commissioner of Education. (Authority to
use a front crossing arm which makes a school bus overlength is contained in
section
56.9
[a]
of this

Title.)
